dmca.title: Trademark Complaint from Lilly ICOS for my-medicare.com
dmca.body:
Please note that the website referenced in your DMCA notice does not
reside within our network as of 10:55:16 a.m. (GMT-6) on December 21,
2006.
 
Legal Response Team
The Planet

-----Original Message-----
From: Casey McIntosh [mailto:cmcintosh@netenforcers.com] 
Sent: Thursday, December 21, 2006 9:09 AM
To: Legal Response
Cc: Copyright
Subject: RE: Trademark Complaint from Lilly ICOS for my-medicare.com

To Whom it may concern,

Have you checked these URLs personally? They are still hosting
infringing material. Nothing has been changed. Until compliance is
sufficient, this case will remain open. On behalf of our client, Eli
Lilly ICOS (Cialis), thank you for your ongoing support in resolving
this matter.

-Casey McIntosh
LMS Agent, Special Investigations
Net Enforcers Inc.
CMcIntosh@Netenforcers.com


-----Original Message-----
From: legal-response@theplanet.com [mailto:legal-response@theplanet.com]

Sent: Wednesday, December 20, 2006 1:01 PM
To: Casey McIntosh; copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Trademark Complaint from Lilly ICOS for my-medicare.com

To Whom It May Concern:

This letter confirms that access to the materials referenced in your
below-pasted complaint has been disabled.

Legal Response Team
The Planet



---------



From: Casey McIntosh
[mailto:cmcintosh@netenforcers.com]
Sent: Monday, December 04, 2006 9:59 AM
To:
Legal Response
Cc: Copyright; doctor@my-medicare.com
Subject: Re: Trademark
Complaint from Lilly ICOS for www.my-medicare.com




To whom it may concern,




The case between our client, Eli Lilly ICOS (Cialis) and
www.my-medicare.com <http://www.my-medicare.com/> will remain
open. I have personally re-checked the website in question and have
found various violations. For example, the following URL is hosting an
IP text violation. The words "Generic Cialis" are considered a violation
of Eli Lilly ICOS's Intellectual Property. The sale of Generic Cialis is
illegal in the United States as is the advertised text, as can be seen
in this URL:




http://generic-cialis.my-medicare.com/




http://www.my-medicare.com/generic-cialis-soft-tabs.html



Finally, any
pictures of packaging, pills, and or Eli Lilly trademarks are also
considered a violation of Eli Lilly's intellectual property. As stated
prior, the case will remain open until these violations are removed.
Thank you for your ongoing support in resolving this matter.
Please let me know if I can be of further assistance, I can be reached
at CMcIntosh@Netenforcers.com.



Casey
McIntosh

LMS Representative

Net Enforcers
Inc.

CMcIntosh@netenforcers.com

compliance.management@netenforcers.com



The
Online Enforcement Specialists......

Statement of Confidentiality

The contents
of this e-mail message and any attachments are confidential and are
intended solely for the addressee. The information may also be legally
privileged. This transmission is sent in trust, for the sole purpose of
delivery to the intended recipient. If you have received this
transmission in error, any use, reproduction or dissemination of this
transmission is strictly prohibited. If you are not the intended
recipient, please immediately notify the sender by reply e-mail and
delete this message and it's attachments, if any. Thank you.
